alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 7:59PM EDT until March 16 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Columbia County in east central Georgia... Northwestern Burke County in east central Georgia... Western Richmond County in east central Georgia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 759 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hephzibah, or near Fort Gordon, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Hephzibah, Harlem, South Augusta, Riverwood, Augusta Mall, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Blythe, Liberty Park Community Center, Bath-Edie, Blanchard Park, Columbia County Jail, Westmont, Bellevue Memorial Gardens, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Riverside Park and Evans Medical Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 179 and 196. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
